text: 22:16 Mak 3:6; 8:15; 12:13Egha me uan suren gumazir maba ko Herotɨn gɨn zuir marazi amadazɨ, me Iesus bagha ghua kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Tisa, e fo nɨ guizbangɨra bizibav geir gumazim. Nɨ Godɨn Arazibar gumazamizibar sure gamua guizbangɨra me mɨgei. Nɨ tavɨn nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Akar vamɨra nɨ gumazamizir ziaba itiba, ko gumazamizir kɨniba uaghara, me mɨgei.
